Class ContactsApp

java.lang.Object
ContactsApp
public class ContactsApp extends Object

Contacts App

With this app you can create, view, update and delete contacts. It saves new contacts in a folder. It used Personal ID as text filename.

      public ContactsApp()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method which makes use of all other methods.
      Parameters:
      args - Unused.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - On error.

    • viewContacts

      public static void viewContacts(Scanner sc, boolean deleteMode)
      View Contact method searches the directory and lists all contacts inside of it.
      Parameters:
      sc - System input scanner.
      deleteMode - Boolean value. If set to true selected contact will be deleted.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - On error.

    • openContact

      public static void openContact(Scanner sc, String contactFilename)
      Open Contact method opens contact file and reads it. It prints all data that the .txt file is containing.
      Parameters:
      sc - System input scanner.
      contactFilename - String filename. Opens that specific file and reads it.
      Throws:
      IOException - On read file error.
      InterruptedException - On error.

    • editContact

      public static void editContact(Scanner sc, String contactFilename, boolean newContact)
      Edit Contact method is used for editing the contact .txt file. It is also used when creating new a new contact and new contact gets saved in temporary folder until user enters command to save it.
      Parameters:
      sc - System input scanner.
      contactFilename - String filename. Opens that specific file and reads it.
      newContact - Boolean value. If set to true new contacts is being creating and it will be saved in different folder until user enters command to save it.
      Throws:
      IOException - On read file error.
      InterruptedException - On error.

    • updateContact

      public static void updateContact(String personalID, String firstName, String lastName, String phoneNumber, String address, String email, boolean temporaryContact)
      Update Contact method is used for updating specific file. When passed with all required arguments it updates that file.
      Parameters:
      personalID - This value is used also for creating that file. Filename will be personalID.txt (mandatory value).
      firstName - First name (mandatory value).
      lastName - Last name (mandatory value).
      phoneNumber - Phone number (mandatory value).
      address - Address.
      email - Email address.
      temporaryContact - Boolean value. If set to true it will save contact in temporary folder until user enters command to save it.
      Throws:
      IOException - On read file error.

    • printHeader

      public static void printHeader(String tab)
      Print Header method is user in every other method. It just prints the header.
      Parameters:
      tab - This value will be printed on header.

    • deleteContact

      public static void deleteContact(String contactFilename)
      Delete Contact method is used for deleteing that specific contact file.
      Parameters:
      contactFilename - String filename. Deletes that specific file competely.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - On error.

    • clearTempFolder

      public static void clearTempFolder()
      Clear Temp Folder method is used for removing all files in temp folder. It runs everytime app opens.

    • clearConsole

      public static void clearConsole()
      Clear Console method is used for keeping console output clean. It runs everytime method starts over. It checks for OS because Linux has different command of clering console.
